DisputeReportPanel.visible = false;\\n}\\n//$('#guideContainer-rootPanel-guideimage__').hide();"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"//fetch dispute details from ea and district\\nvar params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar actualData=JSON.parse(window.atob(params.get('input')));\\n//console.log(actualData);\\nea.value=actualData.ea;\\ndistrict.value=actualData.district;\\nif(actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRB_CHAIR\\" || actualData.userRole.toString().toUpperCase()===\\"DRA\\"){\\n Next.enabled=true;\\n}\\nelse{\\n Next.enabled=false;\\n}\\nvar jsonData={'ea':ea.value\,'district':district.value\,'InfoType':'Complete'\,'DRType' : actualData.type};\\n//console.log(jsonData);\\n$.ajax({ \\n type: 'GET'\, \\n contentType: 'application/xml'\, \\n url: window.location.protocol+\\"//\\"+window.location.hostname+\\":\\"+window.location.port+'/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/GetDisputeMeetings'\,\\n data: jsonData\,\\n success: function (data) {\\n //console.log(data);\\n //console.log(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DRBMembersDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n count=parseInt(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"GetRowCount\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n listIDs=[];\\n if(count>0){\\n jsonResponse = JSON.parse(data.getElementsByTagName(\\"DRBMembersDetailsJson\\")[0].innerHTML);\\n // console.log(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings);\\n //console.log(data.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.length);\\n if(count===1){\\n listIDs.push(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting.DISPUTE_MEETING_ID);\\n }\\n else{\\n for(var i=0; i<count; i++){ \\n listIDs.push(jsonResponse.Dispute_Meetings.Meeting[i].DISPUTE_MEETING_ID);\\n }\\n }\\n SelectDisputeIDList.items=listIDs;\\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.DMRMainPanel.DMRDPanel"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
